verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Again, thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H376>Whosoever<s%> he be of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> any of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> unto <S%H4432>Molech<s%>; he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>: the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H68>stones<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H376>man<s%>, and will cut him <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>; because he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> unto <S%H4432>Molech<s%>, to <S%H2930>defile<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, and to <S%H2490>profane<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>.

And if the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> do any <S%H5956>ways<s%> <S%H5956>hide<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from the <S%H376>man<s%>, when he <S%H5414>giveth<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> unto <S%H4432>Molech<s%>, and <S%H4191>kill<s%> him <S%H1115>not<s%>:

Then I will <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H376>man<s%>, and against his <S%H4940>family<s%>, and will cut him <S%H3772>off<s%>, and all that go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, to commit <S%H2181>whoredom<s%> with <S%H4432>Molech<s%>, from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H5971>people<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H6437>turneth<s%> <S%H413>after<s%> such as have familiar <S%H178>spirits<s%>, and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3049>wizards<s%>, to go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, I will even <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and will cut him <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
¶ <S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> yourselves therefore, and be ye <S%H6918>holy<s%>: for I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
And ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> you.

¶ For <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> that <S%H7043>curseth<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%> shall be <S%H4191>surely<s%> put to <S%H4191>death<s%>: he hath <S%H7043>cursed<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%>; his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon him.

¶ And the <S%H376>man<s%> that committeth <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with another <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>, even he that committeth <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbour's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>, the <S%H5003>adulterer<s%> and the <S%H5003>adulteress<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7901>lieth<s%> with his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> hath <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>: <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>; their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon them.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lie<s%> with his daughter in <S%H3618>law<s%>, <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>: they have <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H8397>confusion<s%>; their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon them.

If a <S%H376>man<s%> also <S%H7901>lie<s%> with <S%H2145>mankind<s%>, as he <S%H4904>lieth<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%>, <S%H8147>both<s%> of them have <S%H6213>committed<s%> an <S%H8441>abomination<s%>: they shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>; their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon them.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> and her <S%H517>mother<s%>, it is <S%H2154>wickedness<s%>: they shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, both he and they; that there be no <S%H2154>wickedness<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you.
And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414%H7903>lie<s%> with a <S%H929>beast<s%>, he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>: and ye shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> the <S%H929>beast<s%>.

And if a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7126>approach<s%> unto any <S%H929>beast<s%>, and lie <S%H7250>down<s%> thereto, thou shalt <S%H2026>kill<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%>, and the <S%H929>beast<s%>: they shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>; their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon them.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H269>sister<s%>, his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>, and she <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>; it is a wicked <S%H2617>thing<s%>; and they shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of their <S%H5971%H1121>people<s%>: he hath <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H269>sister's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>; he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> having her <S%H1739>sickness<s%>, and shall <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>; he hath <S%H6168>discovered<s%> her <S%H4726>fountain<s%>, and she hath <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood<s%>: and <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And thou shalt not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%>, nor of thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%>: for he <S%H6168>uncovereth<s%> his near <S%H7607>kin<s%>: they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with his uncle's <S%H1733>wife<s%>, he hath <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H1730>uncle's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>: they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H2399>sin<s%>; they shall <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H6185>childless<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>, it is an unclean <S%H5079>thing<s%>: he hath <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>; they shall be <S%H6185>childless<s%>.

¶ Ye shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> all my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and all my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: that the <S%H776>land<s%>, whither I <S%H935>bring<s%> you to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein, spue you not <S%H6958>out<s%>.

And ye shall not <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H2708>manners<s%> of the <S%H1471>nation<s%>, which I cast <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you: for they <S%H6213>committed<s%> all these things, and therefore I <S%H6973>abhorred<s%> them.

But I have <S%H559>said<s%> unto you, Ye shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> their <S%H127>land<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which have <S%H914>separated<s%> you from other <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Ye shall therefore put <S%H914>difference<s%> between <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>beasts<s%> and <S%H2931>unclean<s%>, and between <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H5775>fowls<s%> and <S%H2889>clean<s%>: and ye shall not make your <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H8262>abominable<s%> by <S%H929>beast<s%>, or by <S%H5775>fowl<s%>, or by any manner of living thing that <S%H7430>creepeth<s%> on the <S%H127>ground<s%>, which I have <S%H914>separated<s%> from you as <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.
And ye shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%> unto me: for I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> am <S%H6918>holy<s%>, and have <S%H914>severed<s%> you from other <S%H5971>people<s%>, that ye should be mine.

¶ A <S%H376>man<s%> also or <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H3588>hath<s%> a familiar <S%H178>spirit<s%>, or that is a <S%H3049>wizard<s%>, shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>: they shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> them with <S%H68>stones<s%>: their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon them.
